plan_name: Acme Corporation Financial Risk Management Plan
risk_management_objectives: Develop and implement strategies to mitigate financial risks
Monitor and report on financial risks

risk_management_controls.control_description: A policy that sets out the criteria for making investments.
control_objectives: Ensure that investments are made in a prudent manner
Minimize the risk of investment losses
control_procedures: Establish an investment committee to review and approve all investment decisions
Require all investments to be made in accordance with the investment policy
Conduct regular stress tests on investments
Monitor investments on a regular basis

risk_management_controls.control_description: A policy that sets out the criteria for hedging against currency fluctuations.
control_objectives: Minimize the risk of losses due to currency fluctuations
Ensure that hedging activities are conducted in a prudent manner
control_procedures: Establish a hedging committee to review and approve all hedging decisions
Require all hedging transactions to be made in accordance with the hedging policy
Monitor hedging activities on a regular basis

risk_management_reporting.reporting_content: A report on the financial risks faced by the company, the strategies and controls in place to mitigate those risks, the performance of those strategies and controls, and key performance indicators (KPIs) for risk management.
